name: INAddMediaIntent
desc: A request to add a media item.

items.name: init(mediaItems: [INMediaItem]?, mediaSearch: INMediaSearch?, mediaDestination: INMediaDestination?)
items.desc: Creates an intent that describes the media items to add and where to add them.

items.name: var mediaSearch: INMediaSearch?
items.desc: The location to search for the media item to add.

items.name: var mediaDestination: INMediaDestination?
items.desc: The location for the media to add.

items.name: enum INMediaDestination
items.desc: An object that describes the destination for a media item.

items.name: class INMediaDestinationReference
items.desc: An object that describes the destination for a media item.
